original_title: Almost a Dynasty: A Fan Story
overview: Told through the eyes of the players, staff, media and the fans, Almost a Dynasty recounts the incredible journey of the Buffalo Bills and their four consecutive Super Bowl appearances, all ending in losses. Filled with emotion, drama and humor, interviews are woven in with Bills clips to revisit this incredible era in sports history and ultimately force all Bills fans to ponder...would you trade the glory of the run for one?
tagline: Would you trade the glory of the run for one?
title: Almost a Dynasty: A Fan Story
